about_the_game:
Step into the dark world of 2147, a dystopian place of vampires, androids, and dangerous secrets

You are Lina, a young woman desperate to find your twin brother, who vanished the night he became a vampire. Leaving behind the safety of your home, you step into a city where danger hides in every shadow. In your search for answers, you’ll uncover secrets that threaten not just your brother—but the fragile balance of the world itself.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The new humans may look like ordinary people, but beneath their polished exterior lies cold machinery. They call themselves the city's protectors, maintaining order through constant surveillance and binding residents with digital communication rings. They know far too much about you—and this knowledge might lead you to your brother… unless they choose to use it against you.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The true vampires are enemies from your past—immensely powerful and ruling over a part of the city beyond the reach of the new humans. Any encounter with them could easily end your life. Yet, they may hold the key to discovering your brother’s whereabouts.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Bound by blood and ancient rituals, the Cult of Mare shares your vampire lineage, Crustallus. But their shadowy practices hide unsettling truths, and their loyalty might waver. Why are so many of their own disappearing? Can you trust them, or will their secrets pull you deeper into darkness?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Time is running out. Will you uncover the truth behind your brother’s disappearance, or become another lost soul in the shadows of 2147? The choice is yours.

Features:

  • Branching Narrative: Make difficult decisions that have wide-ranging effects and several possible outcomes.

  • (Toxic) Romance: If you dare, go after Saul, Damien, or Cain.Are they meant to bring you down, or can you trust them?

  • Three Paths: Join the Cult of Mare, the new humans, or the true vampires; each group has its own secrets and difficulties. But watch out—no route is free of sacrifice.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features frequent graphic depictions of violence and gore. It contains themes of drug use and suicide. General adult content. Player discretion is advised.

short_description: Year 2147: In a city where androids and vampires rule, you're caught in the crossfire. Searching for your lost twin, who will you trust—and what are you willing to sacrifice? Every choice shapes your fate—for better or worse—in this dark visual novel.
